LayoutNode.SRC: We reccomend flash templates .

<IFRAME style="OVERFLOW: hidden; WIDTH: 155px; BORDER-TOP-STYLE: none; BORDER-RIGHT-STYLE: none; BORDER-LEFT-STYLE: none; HEIGHT: 80px; BORDER-BOTTOM-STYLE: none" src="http://www.facebook.com/plugins/like.php?href=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2F%23%21%2Fpages%2FECML-PKDD-2011%2F111315008934900&layout=standard&show_faces=true&width=155&action=like&colorscheme=light&height=80" frameBorder=0 scrolling=no allowTransparency></IFRAME>

LayoutNode.Content: Joint call for tutorials and workshops ECML/PKDD 2011 http://www.ecmlpkdd2011.org/
LayoutNode.SRC: Joint call for tutorials and workshops ECML/PKDD 2011 http://www.ecmlpkdd2011.org/

LayoutNode.Content: The organizing committee of ECML-PKDD 2011 invites the submission of proposals for the tasks and datasets to be used in ECML-PKDD Discovery Challenge 2011. The Discovery Challenge provides a venue for the collaborative exploration and evaluation of novel and interesting tasks in the areas of Machine Learning and Knowledge Discovery.
LayoutNode.SRC: The organizing committee of ECML-PKDD 2011 invites the submission of proposals for the tasks and datasets to be used in ECML-PKDD Discovery Challenge 2011. The Discovery Challenge provides a venue for the collaborative exploration and evaluation of novel and interesting tasks in the areas of Machine Learning and Knowledge Discovery.

LayoutNode.Content: The outcome of the Discovery Challenge will be presented in a dedicated workshop on the first or the last day of the conference, where the winning and other selected participations will be presented.
LayoutNode.SRC: The outcome of the Discovery Challenge will be presented in a dedicated workshop on the first or the last day of the conference, where the winning and other selected participations will be presented.

LayoutNode.Content: Submitted proposals should be self-contained and should include at least the following information:
LayoutNode.SRC: Submitted proposals should be self-contained and should include at least the following information:

LayoutNode.Content: Title and abstract of the proposed challenge.
LayoutNode.SRC: <LI>Title and abstract of the proposed challenge.

LayoutNode.Content: General description of the proposed challenge.
Description of the dataset used in the proposed challenge.
LayoutNode.SRC: <LI>Description of the dataset used in the proposed challenge.

LayoutNode.Content: Description of at least two tasks in which the Discovery Challenge participants will compete.
LayoutNode.SRC: <LI>Description of at least two tasks in which the Discovery Challenge participants will compete.

LayoutNode.Content: Description of the evaluation procedure and metrics.
LayoutNode.SRC: <LI>Description of the evaluation procedure and metrics.

LayoutNode.Content: Short biography of organizers, mentioning relevant experience.
LayoutNode.SRC: <LI>Short biography of organizers, mentioning relevant experience.

LayoutNode.Content: The submitted proposals should also consider the following points:
LayoutNode.SRC: The submitted proposals should also consider the following points:

LayoutNode.Content: The dataset should be publicly available to facilitate future use and repeatability of experiments.
LayoutNode.SRC: <LI>The dataset should be publicly available to facilitate future use and repeatability of experiments.

LayoutNode.Content: The dataset should be sufficiently large.
The tasks should address novel and interesting research problems, without requiring too much domain-specific knowledge from participants.
LayoutNode.SRC: <LI>The tasks should address novel and interesting research problems, without requiring too much domain-specific knowledge from participants.

LayoutNode.Content: The evaluation procedure should be described clearly and should be easy to apply.
LayoutNode.SRC: <LI>The evaluation procedure should be described clearly and should be easy to apply.

LayoutNode.Content: We encourage organizers to seek awards and prizes for the wining participants in order to attract participation. The acceptance of a proposed Discovery Challenge, however, does not depend on the provision of an award or prize.
LayoutNode.SRC: We encourage organizers to seek awards and prizes for the wining participants in order to attract participation. The acceptance of a proposed Discovery Challenge, however, does not depend on the provision of an award or prize.

LayoutNode.Content: The following deadlines are important for the workshop/tutorial organizers:
LayoutNode.SRC: The following deadlines are important for the workshop/tutorial organizers:

LayoutNode.Content: April 11, 2011: Discovery Challenge announcement: Description of tasks, dataset and metrics become available
LayoutNode.SRC: <LI>April 11, 2011: Discovery Challenge announcement: Description of tasks, dataset and metrics become available

LayoutNode.Content: July 10, 2011: Submission of Discovery Challenge results and reports in appropriate format
LayoutNode.SRC: <LI>July 10, 2011: Submission of Discovery Challenge results and reports in appropriate format

LayoutNode.Content: July 28, 2011: Submission of Camera Ready Copy for selected submissions
LayoutNode.SRC: <LI>July 28, 2011: Submission of Camera Ready Copy for selected submissions

LayoutNode.Content: Sep 5, 2011: Discovery Challenge workshop at ECML-PKDD2011
Discovery Challenge proposals should be submitted in PDF form by email to both Discovery Challenge chairs. All submissions will be acknowledged by email.
LayoutNode.SRC: Discovery Challenge proposals should be submitted in PDF form by email to both Discovery Challenge chairs. All submissions will be acknowledged by email.

LayoutNode.Content: If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are looking forward to your proposals.
LayoutNode.SRC: If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are looking forward to your proposals.

LayoutNode.Content: Vassilis Plachouras (vplachouras-at-aueb.gr), Athens Univ. of Economics and Business
LayoutNode.SRC: <LI>Vassilis Plachouras (vplachouras-at-aueb.gr), Athens Univ. of Economics and Business

LayoutNode.Content: For more information, please check the ECML/PKDD webpage http://www.ecmlpkdd2011.org/
LayoutNode.SRC: For more information, please check the ECML/PKDD webpage http://www.ecmlpkdd2011.org/
